definition: to plow a field in the spring

sentences.english: The season for spring plowing has come.
They are busy with spring ploughing.
We spent most of March ploughing.
sentences.chinese: 三月份的大部分時間我們在春耕。

sentences.english: The farmer is planted grain enthusiasm rises, situation of production of spring ploughing spring sowing is better.
sentences.chinese: 農民種糧積極性提高，春耕春播生產形勢較好。

sentences.english: Spring is here and we are busy with spring ploughing.
sentences.chinese: 春天到了，我們正忙於春耕。

sentences.english: But this spring is a struggle with disaster. The January twelfth earthquake  flattened much of Haiti's capital and surrounding areas.
sentences.chinese: 海地一年一度的春耕，今年春天則是與災難做鬥爭。

sentences.english: Spring ploughing makes preparations for ploughing and sowing the job is clutching fulfil, farmer production enthusiasm is taller.
sentences.chinese: 春耕備耕工作正在抓緊落實，農民生產積極性較高。

sentences.english: Before spring plowing I need to buy some more fodder.
sentences.chinese: 春耕之前我還得買些草料。

sentences.english: Repair farm tools to prepare for spring ploughing.
Spring will come, in the village have to the somebody else all to give a man to repair the drains.
sentences.chinese: 春耕將至，村裏有地的人家都要出一個男人去修水渠。

sentences.english: But the peasants are still busy preparing for the next spring ploughing.
sentences.chinese: 但是農民仍然忙於爲下一個春耕做準備。

definition: to make preparations for plowing and sowing
beginning of spring/the lunar New Year
sowing in autumn (for a crop in spring)
